Reviews.Title: “Perfect for a bed when sight-seeing.”

Reviews.Content: visit paris cheap central hotel de leurope situated short 2 minute walk gare du nord perfect city easily 5star hotel 3star process regeneration reception communal breakfast modern bright clean theres free wifi access lobby accommodation impressive twin en suite dark converted french city house view building hotel seeing cant sightsee paris hotel window didnt bother en suite functional shower cubicle compact dissuade overindulging croissants corridor recently painted brighter tv bed soft sleeping sponge cake concept duvets sheet blanket despite bathroom bed clean cleaned daily cheap 2star hotel feature staff single friendly genuinely helpful speaking french english cant breakfast coffee croissant available lobby 7 euros didnt thoroughly recommend brasserie terminus du nord offers coffee pastries baguette butter jam price lovely traditional brasserie surroundings allowing excellent spot peoplewatching morning hotel satisfactory sleep convenient location affordable ideal romantic weekend soft bed hours inbetween tourist attractions ok

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money and location”

Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 30 basic hotel spent 3 nights triple 2 adult daughters spotlessly clean location 3 mins walk gare du nord staff lovely helpful booked using online reservation rates reasonable recommend restricted value money
